context_of_use: The system allows administrators and power users to manage user accounts, configure system settings, and perform bulk operations.
description: Allow administrators and power users to manage user accounts, configure system settings, and perform bulk operations.
triggering_event: An admin or power user initiates a request to manage system settings or user accounts.
preconditions: The user must have the necessary permissions.
postconditions: User accounts are managed as per the request.
System settings are configured as per the request.
assumptions: Users have the required roles to perform the actions.
requirements_met: The system must allow user account management.
The system must allow configuration of system settings.
The system must support bulk operations.
main_flow: 1. Admin or power user requests to manage user accounts → System processes the request.
2. Admin or power user requests to configure system settings → System processes the request.
3. Power user requests to handle bulk operations → System processes the request.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the user lacks permissions, the system displays an error message.
information_for_steps: 3. Details of bulk operations to be performed.
